name: Ink Spell: USA Place Names
description:
How well do you know America? Ink Spell: USA Place Names will test you on the spellings of some of the quirkiest names the country has to offer, its rich history and diversity coming through in the names of its states, cities, towns and communities. All you have is what kind of place it is, where it is, and how it sounds to say to anyone that lives there.

Good luck, patriot!
